front.title: Deprecating the use of SHA-1 in DNSSEC signature algorithms

abstract.t: This document deprecates the use of the RSASHA1 and RSASHA1-NSEC3-SHA1 algorithms for the creation of DNS Public Key (DNSKEY) and Resource Record Signature (RRSIG) records. It updates RFC4034 and RFC5155 as it deprecates the use of these algorithms.
